commit.message:
* loop.c (insert_bct): Ensure loop_iteration_var non-zero before use.

From-SVN: r22955

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@

+
+	* loop.c (insert_bct): Ensure loop_iteration_var non-zero before use.

 	* emit-rtl.c (init_emit_once): Call INIT_EXPANDERS.
